alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:43PM CDT until July 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR MOWER COUNTY... At 142 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brownsdale to near Lyle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Adams around 210 PM CDT. Grand Meadow around 215 PM CDT. Le Roy around 230 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Sargeant, County Roads 1 And 7, County Roads 56 And 5, Mapleview, Lansing, Brookside Campground and Mayville. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 175 and 204. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
